verbs.description: " [ARG1: Despite the constant negative press covfefe] , " [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: tweeted] . [C-ARG1: And nobody will forget it] .
" Despite the constant negative press covfefe , " Donald Trump tweeted . And [ARG1: nobody] [V: will] forget it .
